Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan
ShortDescription: EB 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, State, 11th, Wabash & Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, State, 11th, Wabash & Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Michigan.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express & #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute at Ewing/95th
ShortDescription: 26 South Shore Express & 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Ewing, 95th, Ave L, 100th & Ewing, due to street blockage near Ewing/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#26 South Shore Express & #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ewing, 95th, Ave L, 100th & Ewing, due to street blockage near Ewing/95th.

Allow extra travel time.
